item.title: LeetCode SQL
item.description: LC 511.Game Play Analysis I http://206.81.6.248:12306/leetcode/game-play-analysis-i/description Table: Activity </| Column Name | Type | | :————- | :————- | | player_id | int | | device_id | int | | event_date | int | | games_played | int | (player_id, event_date) is the primary key of this table. This table shows the activity of players of some game. Each row is a record of a player who logged in and played a number of games (possibly 0) before logging out on some day using some device.
